thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 2 of 478
thread.title: Donald

author: Donald
title: Donald
text:
I ordered bags that I needed promptly. The next day I received a call that the only place they were available was out of the California warehouse and I'd have to pay more for shipping to get the speed that was disclosed at checkout. Clear bags offered no discount on the shipping regardless of their inaccurate disclosure at cheackout.
This review has been updated to 5 stars. I realize issues arise in business and sometimes they have to just been seen by the right person. Clear bags contacted me and resolved the issue. Thank you!
